distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for taglib fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-11439: The TagLib::Ogg::FLAC::File::scan function allowed remote
  attackers to cause information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a
  crafted audio file (bsc#1096180)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The TagLib::Ogg::FLAC::File::scan function in oggflacfile.cpp in TagLib 1.11.1 allows remote attackers to cause information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted audio file.
notes.title: CVE description
